name: Toxic Blob Platformer
description:
You play as a poison blot that shoots poison. The inkblot can interact with poison on walls and ceilings. There are also some other mechanics.

Related to the topic: You are poison, people are afraid of you, you can scare them so that they would do some kind of action.
Constraint:
1. You are not human
2. You kill people for your own benefit :) (Don't do this for real)

The game can be very buggy...And also very annoying.
